attributes.action: Stop the tax allowances for anybody, business or individual, given to allow the costs of Vehicle fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a company has to use fuel in their vehicles to transpotr goods in or out they can claim the cost of this back in tax allowances. I believe that if a product costs more to get to the end user it should be charged at that cost and the user would have a chance to actually value the product.
